body.name: Vinchef Nonstick Deep Frying Pan Skillet with Lid, 11in/5Qt Saute Pan, German 3C+ Ceramic Coating Technology, Heat Indicator, Induction Compatible
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 6 hrs 29 mins
features: ✅【𝑬𝑿𝑪𝑬𝑳𝑳𝑬𝑵𝑻 𝑵𝑶𝑵-𝑺𝑻𝑰𝑪𝑲 𝑪𝑶𝑨𝑻𝑰𝑵𝑮】- Vinchef Saute Pan uses Germany 3C + CERAMIC Reinforced coating technology, has excellent abrasion resistance and extreme long-lasting. PFOA&APEO free, protect your food safety

✅【𝐒𝐔𝐈𝐓𝐀𝐁𝐋𝐄 𝐅𝐎𝐑 𝐀𝐋𝐋 𝐒𝐓𝐎𝐕𝐄】- To let our nonstick skillet meet the needs of more families, we specially designed the induction pan bottom. You can choose gas stove, induction stove, electric stove, halogen stove or ceramic stove at will. Heat evenly and quickly

✅【𝐂𝐎𝐍𝐕𝐄𝐍𝐈𝐄𝐍𝐓 𝐓𝐎 𝐔𝐒𝐄】- The ergonomic handle is bakelite and equipped with a thermal sensor, when frying pans reaches 300℉ which is the optimum heating level, the silicon start to change color. Put the vegetables at the right temp can reduce oily smoke. The glass lid are designed for professional multiple cooking use

✅【𝐇𝐈𝐆𝐇 𝐐𝐔𝐀𝐋𝐈𝐓𝐘 𝐃𝐈𝐄 𝐂𝐀𝐒𝐓 𝐀𝐋𝐔𝐌𝐈𝐍𝐈𝐔𝐌】- Vinchef ceramic pan is lighter than cast-iron pan but just every bit as impressive, cast-aluminium is the better new option for all your cooking needs. What's more, the deepen pot wall and 11inches/5Qt size design allows our frying pan to replace most of the pot products in your kitchen
💝【𝐋𝐈𝐅𝐄𝐓𝐈𝐌𝐄 𝐀𝐒𝐒𝐈𝐒𝐓𝐀𝐍𝐓】- For any quality problem, Vinchef provides a 30-day money-back and free replacement within 6 months
body.description: GERMANY 3C+ CERAMIC REINFORCED COATING German non-stick technology PFOA&APEO free, protect your food safetyReduce oil fume, keep healthy lifeEasy to clean The cast aluminum material makes the whole pot not as heavy as a cast iron pot. The wall thickness of the pot is even (0.25Inch) and the bottom is flat. Heat evenly and quickly. 3-layer with ceramic reinforcement Extremely long-lasting Excellent abrasion resistance

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Deep Frying Pan - 5Qt Saute Pan 10inch Vinchef Frying Pan 12Inch Dosa Tawa Crepe Pan Saute Pan 12inch Options 11 Inch 10 Inch 12 Inch 10 Inch 12 Inch Applicable Stoves Induction / Electric / Gas /Halogen / Ceramic Induction / Electric / Gas /Halogen / Ceramic Induction / Electric / Gas /Halogen / Ceramic Induction / Electric / Gas /Halogen / Ceramic Induction / Electric / Gas /Halogen / Ceramic Nonstick Coating ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Oven Freindly X X X X X Dishwasher Safe Yes, but not recommended Yes, but not recommended Yes, but not recommended Yes, but not recommended Yes, but not recommended

Why Choose Vinchef Nonstick Saute Pans？ A pan for the whole family The deepened depth of the pot makes this skillet to have the function of a soup pot and a frying pan at the same time. With one saute pan you can cook from saute, steam, boil, shallow fry & deep fry. This large 11Inch / 5Qt Pan is big enough to hold a family meal; High performance non-stick coating This deep frying pan interior is coated by 3C+ CERAMIC coating, which is form german technology, makes the saute pan easy to cook and clean; Convenient to use Spouts on both side help both left-handed and right-handed people to pour sauces and other liquids easily;The ergonomic designed heat-insulating bakelite handle is easy to grasp;The heat indicator on the handle makes it easy for you to know how hot the pot is;Suitable for: √ Induction stove √ Gas stove √ Ceramic stove √ Electric stove √ Halogen stove.

Before Frist Use: This operation strengthens the non-stick function of the pan. It can be performed even after the first use. Wash the pan with warm soapy waterSprinkle the pan with oilUse a sponge to distribute it evenlyHeat the pan on the stove for about 3 minutes, during this time the oil will be absorbed (Be careful not to ignite )Clean the pan with kitchen paper to remove excess oil GERMANY 3C+ CERAMIC REINFORCED COATING German non-stick technology PFOA&APEO free, protect your food safetyReduce oil fume, keep healthy lifeEasy to clean The cast aluminum material makes the whole pot not as heavy as a cast iron pot. The wall thickness of the pot is even (0.25Inch) and the bottom is flat. Heat evenly and quickly. 3-layer with ceramic reinforcement Extremely long-lasting Excellent abrasion resistance

ERGONOMIC BAKELITE HANDLE Wood grain bakelite handles make Vinchef's pots more elegant and provide good thermal insulation.The curved design fits the hand and reduces the burden on the hands. HEAT INDICATOR FOR CONVENIENT USE When the pan reaches about 300°F, the silicone start to turn white.Stir-fry at a suitable temp to reduce oily smoke. SILICONE-SEALED LID & POURING MOUTH The deepened pot wall is designed to make the frying pan suitable for more dishes, such as soup or pasta. So we added POURING MOUTH on both sides of the pan for your convenience. EASY TO CLEAN The german non-stick technology provides the universal frying pan excellent non-stick effect.Use neutral detergent and a soft dish towel, you can easily hand washing the pan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Truly non-stick, easy clean-up.
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this pan to use on my induction cooktop. It works very well, heats up quickly and evenly. Clean-up is incredibly easy as nothing sticks to it at all. It feels slightly deeper than other skillets I've had, which I like. Seems to be constructed well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Heavy very good quality
reviews.reviewText: Heavy cooking pan. Good quality and non stick. Can be used for shallow and deep flying. Also use it to cook food. Quite big in size. Lid fits perfectly. Easy to clean and maintain

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My new day-to-day fry pan.
reviews.reviewText: I have used this nearly every day for two months and love it. Sturdy, nonstick for easy cleanup, deep sides.One caveat: It does not have 3 quart capacity as stated in the description. I filled it with water and it held about two quarts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So good I got two!
reviews.reviewText: I initially bought one of these for myself and husband. We liked it so much we bought the white one for a family member. Very light but sturdy. Cleans easily. We have deep fried, sautéed, and pan fried in it and it is one of our favorite pans (we have a ton of All Clad and Caphelon). The price is right too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best frying pan we ever owned!!!
reviews.reviewText: Fast heating and even cooking - easy clean up and the food really doesn't stick!!!What else can one ask from a pan?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to clean
reviews.reviewText: Bought for my husband, for its non stick ability. The pan is deeper than I realized, but makes it more useable. Its non stick surface works great, eggs just slide out, reason I wanted it. Clean up is super easy if done while still warm. Pan is light weight, easy to handle when full. Top fits well. Over all pan works well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars AWESOME SAUTE & FRY PAN
reviews.reviewText: THIS FRYING AND SAUTE PAN IS WELL MADE. FRIST, THE BOTTOM IS HEAVY ALUMINUM CORE WHICH HELPS DISTRIBUTE THE HEAT COMPLETELY. SECOND, THE RED SILICONE TAB ON THE BAKELITE HANDLE TELLS YOU WHEN THE PAN IS HOT AND READY FOR USE. THE RED TAB TURNS WHITE AND THERE YOU GO. VERY LITTLE OIL IF ANY IS NEEDED TO COOK. THE PAN IS DEEP SO YES YOU CAN USE IT AS A MINI STIRY FRY PAN IF YOU LIKE. THE PAN HAS A MARBLE GRANITE FINISH AND IS EASY TO CLEAN. ONE CAUTION IS DO NOT USE METAL UTENSILS OR SCOURING PADS AS IT WILL HURT THE FINISH. THIS IS AN EXCELLENT CHOICE IN ANY MODERN KITCHEN.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Only fry pan we need
reviews.reviewText: It is really easy to work with, nothing sticks, super easy to clean and heavy duty. Impressed with the quality.
I never knew I needed this in my life

reviews.reviewTitle: Ce poêle est merveilleux, excellent qualité
reviews.reviewText: Ce poêle est merveilleux, excellente qualitéJe suis satisfait

reviews.reviewTitle: 9 months n I can’t cook eggs anymore
reviews.reviewText: The 11 in is a litter small but I wanted to try it before buying the 12 inch.Cooks fast, looks great and feels really solid but I hasn’t lasted a year.9 months to the day it worked great now I have a terrible time to clean every day.Good luck
I received this pan today, put water in it to boil, nothing, the induction cooktop just clicked and wouldn't heat up. Don't buy if it is for an induction cooktop
